title: Sicily appears to smash European heat record as temperature soars to nearly 120 degrees Fahrenheit
content:
1. Sicily appears to smash European heat record as temperature soars to nearly 120 degrees Fahrenheit  CBS News
  2. Italy sees 'Europe's hottest ever temperature' as wildfires rage - BBC News  BBC News
  3. Sicily Registers Record-High Temperature as Heat Wave Sweeps Italian Island  The New York Times
  4. OPINION: Bargain homes and fewer crowds - but Italy's deep south is not for everyone  The Local Italy
  5. Italy may have hit Europe's hottest day on record as anticyclone 'Lucifer' sweeps in  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: シチリア島の気温が華氏120度近くまで上昇し、ヨーロッパの暑さの記録を塗り替えようとしている。
西西里岛似乎打破了欧洲的高温记录，温度飙升至近120华氏度
